text.last_approved_text: Great Things Grow Greater

mission_text.text: Great Things Grow Greater

text.last_approved_text: Any Dwarfhold worth its foundations must be able to fill its vaults with gold. Debt is for the beardless!

mission_text.text: Any Dwarfhold worth its foundations must be able to fill its vaults with gold. Debt is for the beardless!

text.last_approved_text: Balance the Books

mission_text.text: Balance the Books

text.last_approved_text: The throngs need leading - go forth into the deeps and find a Thane of Royal blood. Find a grim sort to lead the Clansdwarfs to war!

mission_text.text: The throngs need leading - go forth into the deeps and find a Thane of Royal blood. Find a grim sort to lead the Clansdwarfs to war!

text.last_approved_text: A Grim Sort

mission_text.text: A Grim Sort

text.last_approved_text: During the Golden Age, many wonders of the Old World were Dwarf-built and hidden under the mountains. Let the Dwarfs bring about such an age again.

mission_text.text: During the Golden Age, many wonders of the Old World were Dwarf-built and hidden under the mountains. Let the Dwarfs bring about such an age again.

text.last_approved_text: The Restoration

mission_text.text: The Restoration

text.last_approved_text: The Dwarfs do not forgive or forget very easily, but it is time to strike some grudges from the Dammaz Kron, if only to make room for more.

mission_text.text: The Dwarfs do not forgive or forget very easily, but it is time to strike some grudges from the Dammaz Kron, if only to make room for more.

text.last_approved_text: The Ledger is Full

mission_text.text: The Ledger is Full

text.last_approved_text: Some of the younger generation of Dwarf Engineers are beginning to research and 'innovate'. This doesn't sit well with the traditionalists in the Engineers' Guild, but the High King needs such inquisitive minds in the wars ahead.

mission_text.text: Some of the younger generation of Dwarf Engineers are beginning to research and 'innovate'. This doesn't sit well with the traditionalists in the Engineers' Guild, but the High King needs such inquisitive minds in the wars ahead.

text.last_approved_text: Grumbling in the Engineers' Guild

mission_text.text: Grumbling in the Engineers' Guild

text.last_approved_text: With the High King's tacit permission, the innovators faction within the Engineers' Guild are starting to actually invent things! The traditionalists are in uproar, but the Age of Reckoning will be won in part with new methods, not stagnation!

mission_text.text: With the High King's tacit permission, the innovators faction within the Engineers' Guild are starting to actually invent things! The traditionalists are in uproar, but the Age of Reckoning will be won in part with new methods, not stagnation!

text.last_approved_text: Uproar in the Engineers' Guild

mission_text.text: Uproar in the Engineers' Guild

text.last_approved_text: A sad indictment of the Karaz Ankor is that many a Dwarfhold's Sacred Forge remains unlit, the holy fires burning low or extinguished altogether. It is time they grew bright once more, with a Runesmith hammering at the hearth.

mission_text.text: A sad indictment of the Karaz Ankor is that many a Dwarfhold's Sacred Forge remains unlit, the holy fires burning low or extinguished altogether. It is time they grew bright once more, with a Runesmith hammering at the hearth.

text.last_approved_text: Light the Sacred Forges

mission_text.text: Light the Sacred Forges

text.last_approved_text: There is no definitive rule that marks out the Greatholds from the Dwarfholds. It could be argued that it's the Clansfolk that inhabit the Holds, or the great monuments and halls. Whatever the definition, more Greatholds can only make the Karaz Ankor grow in power.

mission_text.text: There is no definitive rule that marks out the Greatholds from the Dwarfholds. It could be argued that it's the Clansfolk that inhabit the Holds, or the great monuments and halls. Whatever the definition, more Greatholds can only make the Karaz Ankor grow in power.

text.last_approved_text: Dwarfhold to Greathold

mission_text.text: Dwarfhold to Greathold

text.last_approved_text: Each grudge against the Dwarfs is a link in a chain that weighs the whole of the Karaz Ankor low. Thorgrim and his kin must break those chains, and set Dwarfen-folk free!

mission_text.text: Each grudge against the Dwarfs is a link in a chain that weighs the whole of the Karaz Ankor low. Thorgrim and his kin must break those chains, and set Dwarfen-folk free!

text.last_approved_text: Grudgebreaker

mission_text.text: Grudgebreaker

text.last_approved_text: Dwarfs put great stock in the telling of tales, be they sung or recounted in verse. Our Lords need to become like warriors of myth by forging their own legends. For in doing so the Dwarf folk will follow them into the End Times and beyond!

mission_text.text: Dwarfs put great stock in the telling of tales, be they sung or recounted in verse. Our Lords need to become like warriors of myth by forging their own legends. For in doing so the Dwarf folk will follow them into the End Times and beyond!

text.last_approved_text: Storied Warrior

mission_text.text: Storied Warrior

text.last_approved_text: Even the traditionalists of the Engineers' Guild have been won over by this new outlook of improving and iterating on the concepts of the older generations. Continue the engineering renaissance!

mission_text.text: Even the traditionalists of the Engineers' Guild have been won over by this new outlook of improving and iterating on the concepts of the older generations. Continue the engineering renaissance!

text.last_approved_text: Out with Tradition

mission_text.text: Out with Tradition

text.last_approved_text: Nothing fills Dwarfish hearts than seeing brave, bearded warriors with axes in hand, march out to war. A mighty throng is an army that any foe will dread to face!

mission_text.text: Nothing fills Dwarfish hearts than seeing brave, bearded warriors with axes in hand, march out to war. A mighty throng is an army that any foe will dread to face!

text.last_approved_text: A Mighty Throng

mission_text.text: A Mighty Throng

text.last_approved_text: Karaz-a-Karak is the greatest Hold and capital of the Karaz Ankor and seat of the High King since the time before time. Could another Dwarfhold one day rival Everpeak itself? Doubtful.

mission_text.text: Karaz-a-Karak is the greatest Hold and capital of the Karaz Ankor and seat of the High King since the time before time. Could another Dwarfhold one day rival Everpeak itself? Doubtful.

text.last_approved_text: For Everpeak

mission_text.text: For Everpeak

text.last_approved_text: So long as the Dammaz Kron remains filled with the wrongs done to them, the Dwarfs can never put down their axes. No Dwarf can rest as long as there are grudges outstanding!

mission_text.text: So long as the Dammaz Kron remains filled with the wrongs done to them, the Dwarfs can never put down their axes. No Dwarf can rest as long as there are grudges outstanding!

text.last_approved_text: Grudgetamer

mission_text.text: Grudgetamer

text.last_approved_text: To Valaya's sorrow, the Dwarf race is in decline; the older folk outnumber the younger beardlings by some margin. Each Dwarf death is a blow to the entire Dwarfen people; Belegar must ensure he wins battles but convincingly - slaying his foes and keeping his kin alive!

mission_text.text: To Valaya's sorrow, the Dwarf race is in decline; the older folk outnumber the younger beardlings by some margin. Each Dwarf death is a blow to the entire Dwarfen people; Belegar must ensure he wins battles but convincingly - slaying his foes and keeping his kin alive!

text.last_approved_text: Every Dwarf Matters

mission_text.text: Every Dwarf Matters

text.last_approved_text: In the Golden Age, Dwarf throngs comprising thousands of beards would regularly march between Holds, scattering Beastmen and Greenskins alike. While such a sight is much rarer these days, it is surely one to make even the most obstinate Rik proud.

mission_text.text: In the Golden Age, Dwarf throngs comprising thousands of beards would regularly march between Holds, scattering Beastmen and Greenskins alike. While such a sight is much rarer these days, it is surely one to make even the most obstinate Rik proud.

text.last_approved_text: The Throngs of Old

mission_text.text: The Throngs of Old

text.last_approved_text: The Dwarfs know a righteous cause when they see one, and Belegar's quest to reclaim the Eight Peaks is one they all wish to see succeed. The High King has opened his coffers to the Ironhammer, and so too do all Dwarfs, that his throne might be reclaimed for the Karaz Ankor!

mission_text.text: The Dwarfs know a righteous cause when they see one, and Belegar's quest to reclaim the Eight Peaks is one they all wish to see succeed. The High King has opened his coffers to the Ironhammer, and so too do all Dwarfs, that his throne might be reclaimed for the Karaz Ankor!

text.last_approved_text: The Tithes That Bind

mission_text.text: The Tithes That Bind

text.last_approved_text: The Royal Dwarf Clans, including Clan Angrund, are full of gifted Thanes and Riks, ready to take control of the many Dwarf throngs for war. Such Lords must be empowered so they are ready to lead, even as the urks approach their doors.

mission_text.text: The Royal Dwarf Clans, including Clan Angrund, are full of gifted Thanes and Riks, ready to take control of the many Dwarf throngs for war. Such Lords must be empowered so they are ready to lead, even as the urks approach their doors.

text.last_approved_text: A House of Clan Lords

mission_text.text: A House of Clan Lords

text.last_approved_text: The Age of Reckoning is upon the Dwarfs, and many heroes will be forged, their sagas to be sung in drinking halls for the rest of time. Such heroes should be found and raised to greatness, for they can only aid the cause.

mission_text.text: The Age of Reckoning is upon the Dwarfs, and many heroes will be forged, their sagas to be sung in drinking halls for the rest of time. Such heroes should be found and raised to greatness, for they can only aid the cause.

text.last_approved_text: Forge of Heroes

mission_text.text: Forge of Heroes

text.last_approved_text: Despite claims from the Empire and the stubbornness of the traditionalists, Dwarfs are the most technically-able race. A High King who does not furnish its greatest minds and inventors to leverage such gifts is as ignorant as nobles from other races.

mission_text.text: Despite claims from the Empire and the stubbornness of the traditionalists, Dwarfs are the most technically-able race. A High King who does not furnish its greatest minds and inventors to leverage such gifts is as ignorant as nobles from other races.

text.last_approved_text: Eureka!

mission_text.text: Eureka!

text.last_approved_text: Not since the War of the Beard… since when the Ancestor gods walked among the mountain folk… has an army as grand marched forth. The Age of Reckoning is now, the Dammaz Kron wiped clean!

mission_text.text: Not since the War of the Beard… since when the Ancestor gods walked among the mountain folk… has an army as grand marched forth. The Age of Reckoning is now, the Dammaz Kron wiped clean!

text.last_approved_text: A Throng of Legend

mission_text.text: A Throng of Legend

text.last_approved_text: As final victory, for good or ill, draws near, Belegar Ironhammer's influence should be as unyielding as Dwarfen steel. Control of powerful Institutions and Guilds, as well as his own Clan, will give the Ironhammer an edge that will keep all grumblers in line.

mission_text.text: As final victory, for good or ill, draws near, Belegar Ironhammer's influence should be as unyielding as Dwarfen steel. Control of powerful Institutions and Guilds, as well as his own Clan, will give the Ironhammer an edge that will keep all grumblers in line.

text.last_approved_text: King of the Eight Peaks

mission_text.text: King of the Eight Peaks

text.last_approved_text: The final battle is upon the Dwarfs - the great war of vengeance that will see all other races bow before their might. Yet Belegar Ironhammer cannot do all things alone - he must ensure his closest allies, and those Dwarfs who have supported him thus far, are at their most powerful.

mission_text.text: The final battle is upon the Dwarfs - the great war of vengeance that will see all other races bow before their might. Yet Belegar Ironhammer cannot do all things alone - he must ensure his closest allies, and those Dwarfs who have supported him thus far, are at their most powerful.

text.last_approved_text: The War of Vengeance

mission_text.text: The War of Vengeance

text.last_approved_text: It is a time of heroes - an age not seen since Grimnir led great Dwarf warriors into battle. It is time for Belegar Ironhammer to do the same, to bring about such an era, or make his kin believe it so. A great Dwarf Lord should empower such heroes - raise them to greatness!

mission_text.text: It is a time of heroes - an age not seen since Grimnir led great Dwarf warriors into battle. It is time for Belegar Ironhammer to do the same, to bring about such an era, or make his kin believe it so. A great Dwarf Lord should empower such heroes - raise them to greatness!

text.last_approved_text: Time of Heroes

mission_text.text: Time of Heroes

text.last_approved_text: The Age of Reckoning is now. From his reclaimed throne, Belegar Ironhammer needs every ounce of his strength to aid the restoration of the Karaz Ankor. This includes technologies both ancient and new - sweep the traditions of stagnation away, bring innovation to its zenith!

mission_text.text: The Age of Reckoning is now. From his reclaimed throne, Belegar Ironhammer needs every ounce of his strength to aid the restoration of the Karaz Ankor. This includes technologies both ancient and new - sweep the traditions of stagnation away, bring innovation to its zenith!

text.last_approved_text: An Age of Invention

mission_text.text: An Age of Invention

text.last_approved_text: Bring bloodshed and misery to those that stand against the Greenskins. Skarsnik has conspired long and hard to achieve victory, and he will have it by any means necessary. Any means. Gottit, you git? Good.

mission_text.text: Bring bloodshed and misery to those that stand against the Greenskins. Skarsnik has conspired long and hard to achieve victory, and he will have it by any means necessary. Any means. Gottit, you git? Good.

text.last_approved_text: Choppas Out, Lads!

mission_text.text: Choppas Out, Lads!

text.last_approved_text: The gobbos are revolting… in many ways, but they need bringing to heel - Skarsnik has put down many a rebellion in bloody misery, but this might require a less violent touch. Pick a Boss from their disgusting ranks and make him a 'Big Boss'; maybe then they'll behave?

mission_text.text: The gobbos are revolting… in many ways, but they need bringing to heel - Skarsnik has put down many a rebellion in bloody misery, but this might require a less violent touch. Pick a Boss from their disgusting ranks and make him a 'Big Boss'; maybe then they'll behave?

text.last_approved_text: Boss Fight

mission_text.text: Boss Fight

text.last_approved_text: Time to rampage - winning in battle is one thing but a Greenskin's career is all about the lootin' too. Sack and raze enemy settlements - let the foe know that Skarsnik's boyz are coming!

mission_text.text: Time to rampage - winning in battle is one thing but a Greenskin's career is all about the lootin' too. Sack and raze enemy settlements - let the foe know that Skarsnik's boyz are coming!

text.last_approved_text: Yer Sacked!

mission_text.text: Yer Sacked!

text.last_approved_text: Nothing pleases an Orc than being part of a big green mob, mindlessly charging into the enemy. But war is rarely that simple, even the Greenskins know this; sometimes though, somewhat annoyingly, a more strategic approach is needed.

mission_text.text: Nothing pleases an Orc than being part of a big green mob, mindlessly charging into the enemy. But war is rarely that simple, even the Greenskins know this; sometimes though, somewhat annoyingly, a more strategic approach is needed.

text.last_approved_text: Mishon Impozzable

mission_text.text: Mishon Impozzable

text.last_approved_text: The boyz need loot. Skarsnik needs loot. Every git needs loot! So they better find it; a good few raids should sort out the cash flow.

mission_text.text: The boyz need loot. Skarsnik needs loot. Every git needs loot! So they better find it; a good few raids should sort out the cash flow.

text.last_approved_text: Find da Shiny Stuff

mission_text.text: Find da Shiny Stuff

text.last_approved_text: Skarsnik is above his boyz, smarter and more cruel. But now is not the time to be a loner - the world needs dominating, and if he wants part of it, he needs to start mobbing-up!

mission_text.text: Skarsnik is above his boyz, smarter and more cruel. But now is not the time to be a loner - the world needs dominating, and if he wants part of it, he needs to start mobbing-up!

text.last_approved_text: Mob-Up!

mission_text.text: Mob-Up!

text.last_approved_text: Magic is a tricky thing. A few of the enemy wizards are quite good at it! Fortunately, Mork and Gork can provide: some gobbos and Orcs can fling a good spell too. Find a Goblin Shaman as they're normally cheaper and easier to bully.

mission_text.text: Magic is a tricky thing. A few of the enemy wizards are quite good at it! Fortunately, Mork and Gork can provide: some gobbos and Orcs can fling a good spell too. Find a Goblin Shaman as they're normally cheaper and easier to bully.

text.last_approved_text: Get Me a Spell Flinga!

mission_text.text: Get Me a Spell Flinga!

text.last_approved_text: If their enemies don't fear the Greenskins, then how can they be dominated? They need to dish out some serious damage. Start sacking and looting in the name of Skarsnik!

mission_text.text: If their enemies don't fear the Greenskins, then how can they be dominated? They need to dish out some serious damage. Start sacking and looting in the name of Skarsnik!

text.last_approved_text: Sackin' for Pleasure

mission_text.text: Sackin' for Pleasure

text.last_approved_text: Skarsnik is eager to unleash his fiendish plots upon unsuspecting enemies, yet there are things that need doing in preparation for the big charge. Get 'em done, and keep Skarsnik happy.

mission_text.text: Skarsnik is eager to unleash his fiendish plots upon unsuspecting enemies, yet there are things that need doing in preparation for the big charge. Get 'em done, and keep Skarsnik happy.

text.last_approved_text: More Mishons

mission_text.text: More Mishons

text.last_approved_text: Orcs will travel leagues to join a burgeoning Waaagh!, but they won't come for just any Warboss. They are attracted to those favoured by the Gods, by those whose legends are created by the quests they undertake.

mission_text.text: Orcs will travel leagues to join a burgeoning Waaagh!, but they won't come for just any Warboss. They are attracted to those favoured by the Gods, by those whose legends are created by the quests they undertake.

text.last_approved_text: 'Ero Quest

mission_text.text: 'Ero Quest

text.last_approved_text: As much as Skarsnik would revel in outsmarting everyone single-handedly, even he knows he needs the boyz behind him to destroy his foes in short order. The call has gone out, and the mobs are coming.

mission_text.text: As much as Skarsnik would revel in outsmarting everyone single-handedly, even he knows he needs the boyz behind him to destroy his foes in short order. The call has gone out, and the mobs are coming.

text.last_approved_text: Mob Rule

mission_text.text: Mob Rule

text.last_approved_text: While spells of da Little Waaagh! are already at our disposal, it's time to get some of the "bigga spellz" in play. Maybe a foot or fist of Gork to really wind the enemy up? Go and find an Orc Shaman.

mission_text.text: While spells of da Little Waaagh! are already at our disposal, it's time to get some of the "bigga spellz" in play. Maybe a foot or fist of Gork to really wind the enemy up? Go and find an Orc Shaman.

text.last_approved_text: Mork's Gaze

mission_text.text: Mork's Gaze

text.last_approved_text: More ravaging is needed, our foes still have hope, some even think they can beat us! That needs taking from them - see to it!

mission_text.text: More ravaging is needed, our foes still have hope, some even think they can beat us! That needs taking from them - see to it!

text.last_approved_text: Sackin' Time!

mission_text.text: Sackin' Time!

text.last_approved_text: To bring about the largest Waaagh! this pitiful world has ever seen we need to target that Greenskin aggression. Achieve some key objectives and the green tide will flow!

mission_text.text: To bring about the largest Waaagh! this pitiful world has ever seen we need to target that Greenskin aggression. Achieve some key objectives and the green tide will flow!

text.last_approved_text: Yer Mishon… Should Ya Decide Ta Accept It!

mission_text.text: Yer Mishon… Should Ya Decide Ta Accept It!

text.last_approved_text: It ain't cheap keeping all these armies - Orcs are greedy gits that are always after loot and shiny stuff. It might be best to replenish "da cofferz" - a few raids should do the job.

mission_text.text: It ain't cheap keeping all these armies - Orcs are greedy gits that are always after loot and shiny stuff. It might be best to replenish "da cofferz" - a few raids should do the job.

text.last_approved_text: Raiderz ov da Last Orc

mission_text.text: Raiderz ov da Last Orc

text.last_approved_text: The Waaagh! gathers pace! The enemies of the Greenskins - that's everyone without green skin (well, even a few Greenskins to be honest) - will witness a mob like never before. Da Great Ruckus begins!

mission_text.text: The Waaagh! gathers pace! The enemies of the Greenskins - that's everyone without green skin (well, even a few Greenskins to be honest) - will witness a mob like never before. Da Great Ruckus begins!

text.last_approved_text: Da Great Ruckus

mission_text.text: Da Great Ruckus

text.last_approved_text: The true horror of the Greenskin menace is not always seen on the battlefield but in the devastation left in the wake of the Orc ravagers. They are merciless, and often hungry as they scourge enemy ruins. Be merciless, be more Orc!

mission_text.text: The true horror of the Greenskin menace is not always seen on the battlefield but in the devastation left in the wake of the Orc ravagers. They are merciless, and often hungry as they scourge enemy ruins. Be merciless, be more Orc!

text.last_approved_text: Be More Orc!

mission_text.text: Be More Orc!

text.last_approved_text: Skarsnik does not have mates, for he does not need them. He tolerates those around him as he rises to greatness. Yet for the Waaagh! to be successful, Skarsnik must give the brutes below him more power, as he cannot do everything himself.

mission_text.text: Skarsnik does not have mates, for he does not need them. He tolerates those around him as he rises to greatness. Yet for the Waaagh! to be successful, Skarsnik must give the brutes below him more power, as he cannot do everything himself.

text.last_approved_text: Brute Power

mission_text.text: Brute Power

text.last_approved_text: Skarsnik is smart enough to know that, despite his intellect, he needs the Bosses and Shamans around him to enact his schemes. Give them yet more power so that they may serve him!

mission_text.text: Skarsnik is smart enough to know that, despite his intellect, he needs the Bosses and Shamans around him to enact his schemes. Give them yet more power so that they may serve him!

text.last_approved_text: We Don't Need Anovver 'Ero.

mission_text.text: We Don't Need Anovver 'Ero.

text.last_approved_text: The best and shiniest stuff… the loot that can make the eyes of the hardiest Warboss water, is rarely in the neighbouring location. The boyz are going to have to loot deep into enemy territory to get the good stuff!

mission_text.text: The best and shiniest stuff… the loot that can make the eyes of the hardiest Warboss water, is rarely in the neighbouring location. The boyz are going to have to loot deep into enemy territory to get the good stuff!

text.last_approved_text: Da Special Shiny Stuff

mission_text.text: Da Special Shiny Stuff

text.last_approved_text: An unending tide of green - a mass mob of Orcs and Goblins that would make Gork and Mork swell with pride and send Sigmar and his cronies cowering into the Realm of Chaos! That is the goal, now it's time to bring it!

mission_text.text: An unending tide of green - a mass mob of Orcs and Goblins that would make Gork and Mork swell with pride and send Sigmar and his cronies cowering into the Realm of Chaos! That is the goal, now it's time to bring it!

text.last_approved_text: The Mightiest Waaagh! Dat Eva Woz

mission_text.text: The Mightiest Waaagh! Dat Eva Woz

text.last_approved_text: Destroy! We must unleash the beast that lies within every Greenskin. The Orc Gods want this world to tremble, and so our Savage Lord must be "Da Scourge" and burn a scar across the lands that not even time will forget!

mission_text.text: Destroy! We must unleash the beast that lies within every Greenskin. The Orc Gods want this world to tremble, and so our Savage Lord must be "Da Scourge" and burn a scar across the lands that not even time will forget!

text.last_approved_text: Da Scourge

mission_text.text: Da Scourge

text.last_approved_text: Grant the most able Warbosses and magic-users in the Greenskin ranks the power and status they need to bring about a slaughter. It is what Gork demands, and Skarsnik knows it is necessary!

mission_text.text: Grant the most able Warbosses and magic-users in the Greenskin ranks the power and status they need to bring about a slaughter. It is what Gork demands, and Skarsnik knows it is necessary!

text.last_approved_text: I Got Da Power!

mission_text.text: I Got Da Power!

text.last_approved_text: Skarsnik's most feared allies need not only his backing, so they can go about unimpeded, but if they are to spread the word of the Warlord's Waaagh! then they must be granted the power such a message demands!

mission_text.text: Skarsnik's most feared allies need not only his backing, so they can go about unimpeded, but if they are to spread the word of the Warlord's Waaagh! then they must be granted the power such a message demands!

text.last_approved_text: It Comez in Threes!

mission_text.text: It Comez in Threes!

text.last_approved_text: Even for Orcs, the lure of shiny stuff is as strong as the thrill of murder - the richest Bosses are always the most successful. If Skarsnik is to bring about Ragnarork then he must become the wealthiest Greenskin as well.

text.last_approved_text: Wurrzag's most feared subjects need not only his backing so they can go about unimpeded, but if they are to spread the word of Da Great Green Prophet's Waaagh! then they must be granted the power such a message demands!

mission_text.text: Wurrzag's most feared subjects need not only his backing so they can go about unimpeded, but if they are to spread the word of Da Great Green Prophet's Waaagh! then they must be granted the power such a message demands!

text.last_approved_text: It Comez in Threes!

mission_text.text: It Comez in Threes!

text.last_approved_text: Even for Orcs, the lure of shiny stuff is as strong as the thrill of murder - the richest Bosses are always the most successful. If Wurrzag is to bring about Ragnarork, then he must become the wealthiest Greenskin as well.

text.last_approved_text: The Angrund Clan is beset by tribulation. Far from their rightful home, and with little of their former power intact, its Dawi nevertheless cling to hope. Angrund strength endures in King Belegar; aided by the spirits of his restless, vengeful Ancestors, and supported by allied Clans, he will see the Dwarfs’ glory restored!

mission_text.text: The Angrund Clan is beset by tribulation. Far from their rightful home, and with little of their former power intact, its Dawi nevertheless cling to hope. Angrund strength endures in King Belegar; aided by the spirits of his restless, vengeful Ancestors, and supported by allied Clans, he will see the Dwarfs’ glory restored!

text.last_approved_text: The Reckoning Begins

mission_text.text: The Reckoning Begins

text.last_approved_text: With the Time of Woes a distant memory, the Dwarfs should look to the future and the restoration of the Karaz Ankor. The more territory around and even beyond their traditional mountain homes the Dwarfs can claim, the more the Ancestors will be pleased.

mission_text.text: With the Time of Woes a distant memory, the Dwarfs should look to the future and the restoration of the Karaz Ankor. The more territory around and even beyond their traditional mountain homes the Dwarfs can claim, the more the Ancestors will be pleased.

text.last_approved_text: For the Ancestors

mission_text.text: For the Ancestors

text.last_approved_text: The Dwarf expeditionary forces are a brave and vital element of the Dwarf military - they can roam far and secure Holds in the name of their race's glory. Grudges will be wiped from the Dammaz Kron, and the Dwarfs will once again know their rightful glory!

mission_text.text: The Dwarf expeditionary forces are a brave and vital element of the Dwarf military - they can roam far and secure Holds in the name of their race's glory. Grudges will be wiped from the Dammaz Kron, and the Dwarfs will once again know their rightful glory!

text.last_approved_text: The Angrund Clan will know greatness again; Belegar has declared it and his is a fierce and renowned determination. A Dwarf's oath is his honour, and his words his bond. The regions outside of Dawi control must be reclaimed, and made part of their dominion as soon as possible.

mission_text.text: The Angrund Clan will know greatness again; Belegar has declared it and his is a fierce and renowned determination. A Dwarf's oath is his honour, and his words his bond. The regions outside of Dawi control must be reclaimed, and made part of their dominion as soon as possible.

text.last_approved_text: Ironhammer's Oath

mission_text.text: Ironhammer's Oath

text.last_approved_text: Not since Valaya and Grungni strode the mountains have the Dawi been in such a positon. A few more realms taken will see the Karaz Ankor restored to its rightful stature - an empire ruled by those who have committed their all to see it restored, enduring as the mountains themselves. One last push, brave Dawi, one final push...

text.last_approved_text: Skarsnik is the self-styled 'Warlord of the Eight Peaks', sat atop a Dwarf throne, laying waste to all who challenge his dominion. Now he finds himself in the west, with the humies and stunties between him and his mountains. Might as well wreak some havoc on the way back, eh?

mission_text.text: Skarsnik is the self-styled 'Warlord of the Eight Peaks', sat atop a Dwarf throne, laying waste to all who challenge his dominion. Now he finds himself in the west, with the humies and stunties between him and his mountains. Might as well wreak some havoc on the way back, eh?
Warlord

text.last_approved_text: If the Greenskins are going to fear Skarsnik - and they should - then he must use his influence and build up a great green horde to launch an invasion and crush all his enemies. The local tribes must fall into line or get a proper bootin'!

text.last_approved_text: It's time to stop messing around and put the boot in! The Badlands, the World's Edge, the Empire - all of it belongs to the Greenskins! Destroy the trespassers, take their lands and get the Waaagh! started.

text.last_approved_text: My Lord, the dukes of Bretonnia have resided under a chivalrous code for many years. Honour this tradition, build upon the great foundations of Gilles le Breton, and lead the Knightly Orders forward, to glory!

mission_text.text: My Lord, the dukes of Bretonnia have resided under a chivalrous code for many years. Honour this tradition, build upon the great foundations of Gilles le Breton, and lead the Knightly Orders forward, to glory!

text.last_approved_text: The Land of Chivalry

mission_text.text: The Land of Chivalry

text.last_approved_text: Our lands prosper under your chivalrous rule, yet evil still breeds in every corner. Many look to destroy Bretonnia, and their power grows as quickly as our own. Stave off their advances and unite the banners of Bretonnia with your chivalric actions!

mission_text.text: Our lands prosper under your chivalrous rule, yet evil still breeds in every corner. Many look to destroy Bretonnia, and their power grows as quickly as our own. Stave off their advances and unite the banners of Bretonnia with your chivalric actions!

text.last_approved_text: Servants of the Code

mission_text.text: Servants of the Code

text.last_approved_text: Bretonnia flowers in true splendour - tales shall be told of your chivalric deeds for years to come. As our borders expand so our code of chivalry spreads with it. Do not relent, for Bretonnia will be the beacon of light in this ever crumbling world.

mission_text.text: Bretonnia flowers in true splendour - tales shall be told of your chivalric deeds for years to come. As our borders expand so our code of chivalry spreads with it. Do not relent, for Bretonnia will be the beacon of light in this ever crumbling world.

text.last_approved_text: Defenders of Honour

mission_text.text: Defenders of Honour

text.last_approved_text: There are many who wish to invoke the attention of the Dark Gods, but the Ruinous Powers will not favour just any mortal; only those who can prove themselves in battle will receive - even then - the barest flicker of acknowledgement.

mission_text.text: There are many who wish to invoke the attention of the Dark Gods, but the Ruinous Powers will not favour just any mortal; only those who can prove themselves in battle will receive - even then - the barest flicker of acknowledgement.

text.last_approved_text: Blasphemous Might

mission_text.text: Blasphemous Might

text.last_approved_text: The path to damnation is long and treacherous, our master will need followers to accompany him as he walks along it.

mission_text.text: The path to damnation is long and treacherous, our master will need followers to accompany him as he walks along it.

text.last_approved_text: Slave to Darkness

mission_text.text: Slave to Darkness

mission_text.text: The corrupting influence of Chaos begins to spread; ensure its tendrils reach deep into the mortal realms.

text.last_approved_text: Tendrils of Chaos

text.last_approved_text: The tribes of Norsca are useful foot troops in the coming wars, our Lord should gain their favour by offering a token alliance.

mission_text.text: The tribes of Norsca are useful foot troops in the coming wars, our Lord should gain their favour by offering a token alliance.

text.last_approved_text: Placate the Tribes

text.last_approved_text: To be the Everchosen, to command thousands? The Chaos Gods will not consider any being who is not a great warrior with an iron will. Archaon must prove his worth through conquest!

mission_text.text: To be the Everchosen, to command thousands? The Chaos Gods will not consider any being who is not a great warrior with an iron will. Archaon must prove his worth through conquest!

text.last_approved_text: The Conqueror

mission_text.text: The Conqueror

text.last_approved_text: While we can vanquish the mortals with sword and scourge alone, there are many tools at our Lord's disposal. Recruiting a Chaos Sorcerer is but another.

mission_text.text: While we can vanquish the mortals with sword and scourge alone, there are many tools at our Lord's disposal. Recruiting a Chaos Sorcerer is but another.

text.last_approved_text: Minion of Tzeentch

mission_text.text: Minion of Tzeentch

text.last_approved_text: Archaon must maintain his powerbase and support or he will be challenged by unworthy fools who dare to think themselves better than the Three-Eyed King.

mission_text.text: Archaon must maintain his powerbase and support or he will be challenged by unworthy fools who dare to think themselves better than the Three-Eyed King.

text.last_approved_text: Dominion

mission_text.text: Dominion

text.last_approved_text: If the Everchosen is to bring his campaign of destruction beyond the shadow of the Chaos Realm, he must first take the mortal realms and collect their souls!

mission_text.text: If the Everchosen is to bring his campaign of destruction beyond the shadow of the Chaos Realm, he must first take the mortal realms and collect their souls!

text.last_approved_text: Bring About the End Times!

mission_text.text: Bring About the End Times!

text.last_approved_text: Time has no meaning in the Realm of Chaos. For some, Archaon has been the Everchosen for centuries. For others, he has only just begun his Unholy Quest to seize the grand artefacts of Chaos and become the Lord of the End Times.

mission_text.text: Time has no meaning in the Realm of Chaos. For some, Archaon has been the Everchosen for centuries. For others, he has only just begun his Unholy Quest to seize the grand artefacts of Chaos and become the Lord of the End Times.

text.last_approved_text: An Unholy Quest

mission_text.text: An Unholy Quest

text.last_approved_text: All four Marks of Chaos sear Archaon's flesh. But it is Khorne that thirsts and demands the most. Ensure our Lord's forces see battle!

mission_text.text: All four Marks of Chaos sear Archaon's flesh. But it is Khorne that thirsts and demands the most. Ensure our Lord's forces see battle!

text.last_approved_text: The Thirsty God

mission_text.text: The Thirsty God

text.last_approved_text: The more glory the Everchosen achieves, the more jealous his rivals become. They will challenge our master as soon as his dominion falls, so fear and control must be maintained.

mission_text.text: The more glory the Everchosen achieves, the more jealous his rivals become. They will challenge our master as soon as his dominion falls, so fear and control must be maintained.

text.last_approved_text: Sustain Power

mission_text.text: Sustain Power

text.last_approved_text: Raids alone will not bring about the End Times, but mighty Chaos hordes unleashed as part of a massive invasion from the dread north… that is what the Ruinous Powers require.

mission_text.text: Raids alone will not bring about the End Times, but mighty Chaos hordes unleashed as part of a massive invasion from the dread north… that is what the Ruinous Powers require.

text.last_approved_text: Unleash the Horde

mission_text.text: The corrupting influence of Chaos will envelop the world - the Lord of the End Times and his followers must ensure its continued spread.

text.last_approved_text: The Enveloping Tentacles of Chaos

text.last_approved_text: The Blood God's Due

mission_text.text: The Blood God's Due

text.last_approved_text: To marshal a host of the Gods' most foul mortal servants is a great challenge, but one Archaon has to grasp, for the rewards are great and failure not worth contemplating.

text.last_approved_text: Now more than ever - with the ultimate goal in sight - our Lord must be wary and maintain his dominion. There are those that plot against him, including the Great Changer himself.

mission_text.text: Now more than ever - with the ultimate goal in sight - our Lord must be wary and maintain his dominion. There are those that plot against him, including the Great Changer himself.

text.last_approved_text: As the hammer blow strikes on the mortal lands, our Lord is at his most powerful… and most exposed… we must ensure his favour remains strong among the hordes.

mission_text.text: As the hammer blow strikes on the mortal lands, our Lord is at his most powerful… and most exposed… we must ensure his favour remains strong among the hordes.

text.last_approved_text: Some of the younger generation of Dwarf Engineers are beginning to research and 'innovate'. This doesn't sit well with the traditionalists in the Engineers' Guild, but the High King needs such inquisitive minds in the wars ahead.

mission_text.text: Some of the younger generation of Dwarf Engineers are beginning to research and 'innovate'. This doesn't sit well with the traditionalists in the Engineers' Guild, but the High King needs such inquisitive minds in the wars ahead.

text.last_approved_text: Grumbling in the Engineers' Guild

text.last_approved_text: With the High King's tacit permission, the innovators faction within the Engineers' Guild are starting to actually invent things! The traditionalists are in uproar, but the Age of Reckoning will be won in part with new methods, not stagnation!

mission_text.text: With the High King's tacit permission, the innovators faction within the Engineers' Guild are starting to actually invent things! The traditionalists are in uproar, but the Age of Reckoning will be won in part with new methods, not stagnation!

text.last_approved_text: A sad indictment of the Karaz Ankor is that many a Dwarfhold's Sacred Forge remains unlit, the holy fires burning low or extinguished altogether. It is time they grew bright once more, with a Runesmith hammering at the hearth.

text.last_approved_text: There is no definitive rule that marks out the Greatholds from the Dwarfholds. It could be argued that it's the Clansfolk that inhabit the Holds, or the great monuments and halls. Whatever the definition, more Greatholds can only make the Karaz Ankor grow in power.

text.last_approved_text: Each grudge against the Dwarfs is a link in a chain that weighs all of Dwarfkind down. Belegar and his kin must break those chains, and set Dwarfen-folk free!

mission_text.text: Each grudge against the Dwarfs is a link in a chain that weighs all of Dwarfkind down. Belegar and his kin must break those chains, and set Dwarfen-folk free!

text.last_approved_text: Dwarfs put great stock in the telling of tales, be they sung or recounted in verse. Our Lords need to become like warriors of myth by forging their own legends. For in doing so the Dwarf folk will follow them into the End Times and beyond!

mission_text.text: Dwarfs put great stock in the telling of tales, be they sung or recounted in verse. Our Lords need to become like warriors of myth by forging their own legends. For in doing so the Dwarf folk will follow them into the End Times and beyond!

text.last_approved_text: Grudgetamer

mission_text.text: Grudgetamer

text.last_approved_text: To Valaya's sorrow, the Dwarf race is one in decline, the older folk outnumber the younger beardlings by some margin. So each Dwarf death is a blow to the High King. He must win his battles but do so convincingly, by slaying the foe and keeping his kin alive!

mission_text.text: To Valaya's sorrow, the Dwarf race is one in decline, the older folk outnumber the younger beardlings by some margin. So each Dwarf death is a blow to the High King. He must win his battles but do so convincingly, by slaying the foe and keeping his kin alive!

text.last_approved_text: Every Dwarf Matters

mission_text.text: Every Dwarf Matters

text.last_approved_text: In the Golden Age, Dwarf throngs comprising thousands of beards would regularly march between Holds, scattering Beastmen and Greenskins alike. While such a sight is much rarer these days, it is surely one to make even the most obstinate Rik proud.

mission_text.text: In the Golden Age, Dwarf throngs comprising thousands of beards would regularly march between Holds, scattering Beastmen and Greenskins alike. While such a sight is much rarer these days, it is surely one to make even the most obstinate Rik proud.

text.last_approved_text: The Throngs of Old

mission_text.text: The Throngs of Old

text.last_approved_text: The Dwarfholds are all independent kingdoms that pay tribute to the High King, even if they do not always directly obey. Should our Lord directly influence a great or unique institution then his reign will be all the more effective.

mission_text.text: The Dwarfholds are all independent kingdoms that pay tribute to the High King, even if they do not always directly obey. Should our Lord directly influence a great or unique institution then his reign will be all the more effective.

text.last_approved_text: The High King's Assets

mission_text.text: The High King's Assets

text.last_approved_text: The Royal Dwarf Clans are full of gifted Thanes and Riks, ready to take control of the High King's throngs. Such Lords must be empowered so they are ready to lead, even as the urks approach their doors.

mission_text.text: The Royal Dwarf Clans are full of gifted Thanes and Riks, ready to take control of the High King's throngs. Such Lords must be empowered so they are ready to lead, even as the urks approach their doors.

text.last_approved_text: A House of Clan Lords

mission_text.text: A House of Clan Lords

text.last_approved_text: The Age of Reckoning is upon the Dwarfs, and many heroes will be forged, their sagas to be sung in drinking halls for the rest of time. Such heroes should be found and raised to greatness, for they can only aid the cause.

mission_text.text: The Age of Reckoning is upon the Dwarfs, and many heroes will be forged, their sagas to be sung in drinking halls for the rest of time. Such heroes should be found and raised to greatness, for they can only aid the cause.

text.last_approved_text: Forge of Heroes

mission_text.text: Forge of Heroes

text.last_approved_text: Despite claims from the Empire and the stubbornness of the traditionalists, Dwarfs are the most technically-able race. A High King who does not furnish its greatest minds and inventors to leverage such gifts is as ignorant as nobles from other races.

mission_text.text: Despite claims from the Empire and the stubbornness of the traditionalists, Dwarfs are the most technically-able race. A High King who does not furnish its greatest minds and inventors to leverage such gifts is as ignorant as nobles from other races.

text.last_approved_text: Eureka!

mission_text.text: Eureka!

text.last_approved_text: Not since the War of the Beard… since when the Ancestor Gods walked among the mountain folk… has an army as grand marched forth. The Age of Reckoning is now, the Dammaz Kron wiped clean!

mission_text.text: Not since the War of the Beard… since when the Ancestor Gods walked among the mountain folk… has an army as grand marched forth. The Age of Reckoning is now, the Dammaz Kron wiped clean!

text.last_approved_text: A Throng of Legend

mission_text.text: A Throng of Legend

text.last_approved_text: As victory for good or not draws close, the High King's influence should be as unyielding as Dwarfen steel. Owning powerful Institutions and Guilds, instead of the Clans, gives Thorgrim an edge that will keep all grumblers in line.

mission_text.text: As victory for good or not draws close, the High King's influence should be as unyielding as Dwarfen steel. Owning powerful Institutions and Guilds, instead of the Clans, gives Thorgrim an edge that will keep all grumblers in line.

text.last_approved_text: Highest King

mission_text.text: Highest King

text.last_approved_text: The final battle is upon the Dwarfs - the great war of vengeance that will see all other races bow before their might. But the High King cannot do this alone, he must ensure his closest allies are at their most powerful.

mission_text.text: The final battle is upon the Dwarfs - the great war of vengeance that will see all other races bow before their might. But the High King cannot do this alone, he must ensure his closest allies are at their most powerful.

text.last_approved_text: The War of Vengeance

mission_text.text: The War of Vengeance

text.last_approved_text: It is a time of heroes, an age not seen since Grimnir led great warriors in battle. Grudgebearer must bring about such an era, or make his kin believe it is so. The High King should empower such heroes - raise them to greatness!

mission_text.text: It is a time of heroes, an age not seen since Grimnir led great warriors in battle. Grudgebearer must bring about such an era, or make his kin believe it is so. The High King should empower such heroes - raise them to greatness!

text.last_approved_text: Time of Heroes

mission_text.text: Time of Heroes

text.last_approved_text: The Age of Reckoning is now. The High King needs every tool to bring the Karaz Ankor to beyond its former glory. This includes technologies ancient and new; sweep the traditions of stagnation away, bring innovation to its zenith!

mission_text.text: The Age of Reckoning is now. The High King needs every tool to bring the Karaz Ankor to beyond its former glory. This includes technologies ancient and new; sweep the traditions of stagnation away, bring innovation to its zenith!

text.last_approved_text: An Age of Invention

mission_text.text: An Age of Invention

text.last_approved_text: The Emperor's banner should be seen in battle; after all, it was the backing of the Sigmarite Cult that won Karl Franz the throne, now he must be like the Warrior-King of old!

mission_text.text: The Emperor's banner should be seen in battle; after all, it was the backing of the Sigmarite Cult that won Karl Franz the throne, now he must be like the Warrior-King of old!
Warrior-King

text.last_approved_text: Every Emperor that takes the throne surrounds himself by men whose abilities and loyalty are as strong as the steel they carry. Recruit such a warrior.

mission_text.text: Every Emperor that takes the throne surrounds himself by men whose abilities and loyalty are as strong as the steel they carry. Recruit such a warrior.

text.last_approved_text: Captain's Fable

mission_text.text: Captain's Fable

text.last_approved_text: For the Empire to remain the mightiest of all nations then infrastructure is key. Ulric will be pleased with our Lord's prowess in battle, but there are many other gods to appease and raising great buildings and monuments is one way to achieve that.

mission_text.text: For the Empire to remain the mightiest of all nations then infrastructure is key. Ulric will be pleased with our Lord's prowess in battle, but there are many other gods to appease and raising great buildings and monuments is one way to achieve that.

text.last_approved_text: Build Greatness

mission_text.text: Build Greatness

text.last_approved_text: Assailed by enemies within and without, the Empire is cursed to never know true peace - but Karl Franz was elected Emperor on the promise of quelling the myriad foes, and so his campaign begins in earnest.

mission_text.text: Assailed by enemies within and without, the Empire is cursed to never know true peace - but Karl Franz was elected Emperor on the promise of quelling the myriad foes, and so his campaign begins in earnest.

text.last_approved_text: Election Campaign

mission_text.text: Election Campaign

text.last_approved_text: The Emperor cannot reign over the entire nation without the backing of the Elector Counts, who rule their provinces autonomously. While belligerent Electors may need the threat of steel to come on side, others can be won over with the dove.

mission_text.text: The Emperor cannot reign over the entire nation without the backing of the Elector Counts, who rule their provinces autonomously. While belligerent Electors may need the threat of steel to come on side, others can be won over with the dove.

text.last_approved_text: Shallya's Dove

mission_text.text: Shallya's Dove

text.last_approved_text: In the quest to bring the Empire under Karl Franz's sway, overt diplomacy is not the only method - especially when an Elector or some other regional noble is publicly against him. There are more subtle ways to bring a region to heel.

mission_text.text: In the quest to bring the Empire under Karl Franz's sway, overt diplomacy is not the only method - especially when an Elector or some other regional noble is publicly against him. There are more subtle ways to bring a region to heel.

text.last_approved_text: Bring to Heel

mission_text.text: Bring to Heel

text.last_approved_text: The Colleges of Magic were founded in the wake of the Great War Against Chaos and the coronation of Magnus the Pious. Never again would the Empire suffer at the magic of others. Now the Empire requires a student from the Colleges to accompany our forces.

mission_text.text: The Colleges of Magic were founded in the wake of the Great War Against Chaos and the coronation of Magnus the Pious. Never again would the Empire suffer at the magic of others. Now the Empire requires a student from the Colleges to accompany our forces.

text.last_approved_text: Apt Pupil

mission_text.text: Apt Pupil

text.last_approved_text: The greatest cities in the Old World reside in the Empire, they are full of danger and wonders, attracting visitors and great minds from across the world. To retain the influx of the great, the cities must prosper.

mission_text.text: The greatest cities in the Old World reside in the Empire, they are full of danger and wonders, attracting visitors and great minds from across the world. To retain the influx of the great, the cities must prosper.

text.last_approved_text: Keep Building

mission_text.text: Keep Building

text.last_approved_text: Our enemies move against us, so we must be decisive both in our own military and strategic goals. Send your subjects and agents on high-priority missions to secure the throne.

mission_text.text: Our enemies move against us, so we must be decisive both in our own military and strategic goals. Send your subjects and agents on high-priority missions to secure the throne.

text.last_approved_text: Mission Control

mission_text.text: Mission Control

text.last_approved_text: A legendary quest fall upon our Lords - rewards and greatness awaits those brave enough to undertake such tasks, for they will be remembered in the annals of history.

mission_text.text: A legendary quest fall upon our Lords - rewards and greatness awaits those brave enough to undertake such tasks, for they will be remembered in the annals of history.

text.last_approved_text: Become Legend

mission_text.text: Become Legend

text.last_approved_text: When Chaos comes or the Greenskins rampage, then borders become irrelevant. Mankind as a race has to come together. This must be achieved by any means necessary.

mission_text.text: When Chaos comes or the Greenskins rampage, then borders become irrelevant. Mankind as a race has to come together. This must be achieved by any means necessary.

text.last_approved_text: Unite or Die

mission_text.text: Unite or Die

text.last_approved_text: It is time our enemies knew what they stood against. An army of disciplined Men of the Empire in all their magnificent panoply will send a strong message through these lands.

mission_text.text: It is time our enemies knew what they stood against. An army of disciplined Men of the Empire in all their magnificent panoply will send a strong message through these lands.

text.last_approved_text: Might Makes Right

mission_text.text: Might Makes Right

text.last_approved_text: The Empire is the greatest nation of the Old World. To retain such a title it needs to dazzle and impress and beguile visitors from all across the realms. Its cities are islands of stature in the vast wilderness of the nation, and the buildings within, jewels.

mission_text.text: The Empire is the greatest nation of the Old World. To retain such a title it needs to dazzle and impress and beguile visitors from all across the realms. Its cities are islands of stature in the vast wilderness of the nation, and the buildings within, jewels.

text.last_approved_text: A Wonder of the Old World

mission_text.text: A Wonder of the Old World

text.last_approved_text: The Emperor's influence spreads far across the lands and beyond our borders. Give loyal servants the authority to enact Franz's will against the enemies of Sigmar, so we can consolidate our power.

mission_text.text: The Emperor's influence spreads far across the lands and beyond our borders. Give loyal servants the authority to enact Franz's will against the enemies of Sigmar, so we can consolidate our power.

text.last_approved_text: Mission Critical

mission_text.text: Mission Critical

text.last_approved_text: There is no stronger message to our foes than dominance on the battlefield. Victories are empty things if we lose too many of our own forces in the engagement. It is time to smash the foe, and have them fleeing before our armoured might.

mission_text.text: There is no stronger message to our foes than dominance on the battlefield. Victories are empty things if we lose too many of our own forces in the engagement. It is time to smash the foe, and have them fleeing before our armoured might.

text.last_approved_text: A Trio of Victories

mission_text.text: A Trio of Victories

text.last_approved_text: A grand muster is called for. The full armoured might of the Empire should be deployed in all its awesome glory. Such a sight will make Ulric and Sigmar weep with joy and their enemies quail with fear.

mission_text.text: A grand muster is called for. The full armoured might of the Empire should be deployed in all its awesome glory. Such a sight will make Ulric and Sigmar weep with joy and their enemies quail with fear.

text.last_approved_text: Armoured Might

mission_text.text: Armoured Might

text.last_approved_text: The Empire is an eclectic place full of many esoteric organisations - religious and otherwise. Such institutions hold a lot of sway, so their blessing is always a boon to any ruling Emperor. Having dominion over their headquarters certainly helps too...

mission_text.text: The Empire is an eclectic place full of many esoteric organisations - religious and otherwise. Such institutions hold a lot of sway, so their blessing is always a boon to any ruling Emperor. Having dominion over their headquarters certainly helps too...

text.last_approved_text: Institutionalised Help

mission_text.text: Institutionalised Help

text.last_approved_text: The greater our most loyal servants become, the tighter the Emperor's rule. Elevate a Lord with power, wealth and influence so that Karl Franz's reign can never be gainsayed by enemies within or without.

mission_text.text: The greater our most loyal servants become, the tighter the Emperor's rule. Elevate a Lord with power, wealth and influence so that Karl Franz's reign can never be gainsayed by enemies within or without.

text.last_approved_text: Lording It

mission_text.text: Lording It

text.last_approved_text: The Emperor has many willing servants; if loyal nobles are elevated to greatness, so, too, should those whose skills and influence lie in other disciplines. Make them great and their faith in Karl Franz will be swollen tenfold.

mission_text.text: The Emperor has many willing servants; if loyal nobles are elevated to greatness, so, too, should those whose skills and influence lie in other disciplines. Make them great and their faith in Karl Franz will be swollen tenfold.

text.last_approved_text: Champions of Franz

mission_text.text: Champions of Franz

text.last_approved_text: Although the Dwarfs will falsely claim otherwise, the Empire is the most technically able race in the world. Mankind willing innovates and is not moribund in tradition or the petty jealousies of the Dwarfen Guilds. We should exploit that.

mission_text.text: Although the Dwarfs will falsely claim otherwise, the Empire is the most technically able race in the world. Mankind willing innovates and is not moribund in tradition or the petty jealousies of the Dwarfen Guilds. We should exploit that.

text.last_approved_text: Invent & Innovate

mission_text.text: Invent & Innovate

text.last_approved_text: Not since the Time of Magnus has there been a greater muster; the armies of the Empire should come together at last, for we stand ready to fight the mightiest of battles. This will be a call to arms like no other!

mission_text.text: Not since the Time of Magnus has there been a greater muster; the armies of the Empire should come together at last, for we stand ready to fight the mightiest of battles. This will be a call to arms like no other!

text.last_approved_text: A Call to Arms

mission_text.text: A Call to Arms

text.last_approved_text: The ultimate threat draws near, those institutions and temples not with us should be brought under our control. The Emperor cares not how this is achieved - offer the branch or the lash - we will have them under Karl Franz's will.

mission_text.text: The ultimate threat draws near, those institutions and temples not with us should be brought under our control. The Emperor cares not how this is achieved - offer the branch or the lash - we will have them under Karl Franz's will.

text.last_approved_text: Emperor's Will

mission_text.text: Emperor's Will

text.last_approved_text: We must raise as many nobles to our circle of influence - make them the greatest they can be, for their loyalty will filter down to the men, girding them for the ultimate conquest.

mission_text.text: We must raise as many nobles to our circle of influence - make them the greatest they can be, for their loyalty will filter down to the men, girding them for the ultimate conquest.

text.last_approved_text: Noble Circle

mission_text.text: Noble Circle

text.last_approved_text: Empower our agents, give them all the tools they need to spread discord in the foes' armies and sow discontent in their territory.

mission_text.text: Empower our agents, give them all the tools they need to spread discord in the foes' armies and sow discontent in their territory.

text.last_approved_text: Inspiring Presence

mission_text.text: Inspiring Presence

text.last_approved_text: Ensure our greatest minds have stretched themselves. We must seek out every innovation not yet discovered, for this will give us an edge in the battles and conquest yet to play out.

mission_text.text: Ensure our greatest minds have stretched themselves. We must seek out every innovation not yet discovered, for this will give us an edge in the battles and conquest yet to play out.

text.last_approved_text: Seek Out Knowledge

mission_text.text: Seek Out Knowledge

text.last_approved_text: Bring bloodshed and misery to those that stand against the Greenskins. Grimgor expects victory, he won't suffer failure. Gottit, you git? Good.

mission_text.text: Bring bloodshed and misery to those that stand against the Greenskins. Grimgor expects victory, he won't suffer failure. Gottit, you git? Good.

text.last_approved_text: Choppas Out, Lads!

mission_text.text: Choppas Out, Lads!

text.last_approved_text: The gobbos are revolting… in many ways, but they need bringing to heel, or Grimgor will just kill the lot of 'em. Pick a Boss from their disgusting ranks and make him a 'Big Boss'; maybe then they'll behave?

mission_text.text: The gobbos are revolting… in many ways, but they need bringing to heel, or Grimgor will just kill the lot of 'em. Pick a Boss from their disgusting ranks and make him a 'Big Boss'; maybe then they'll behave?

text.last_approved_text: Boss Fight

mission_text.text: Boss Fight

text.last_approved_text: Time to rampage - winning in battle is one thing but a Greenskins career is all about the lootin' too. Sack and raze enemy settlements - let the foe know that Grimgor's boyz are coming!

mission_text.text: Time to rampage - winning in battle is one thing but a Greenskins career is all about the lootin' too. Sack and raze enemy settlements - let the foe know that Grimgor's boyz are coming!

text.last_approved_text: Yer Sacked!

mission_text.text: Yer Sacked!

text.last_approved_text: Nothing pleases an Orc than being part of a big green mob, mindlessly charging into the enemy. But war is rarely that simple, even the Greenskins know this; sometimes though, somewhat annoyingly, a more strategic approach is needed.

mission_text.text: Nothing pleases an Orc than being part of a big green mob, mindlessly charging into the enemy. But war is rarely that simple, even the Greenskins know this; sometimes though, somewhat annoyingly, a more strategic approach is needed.

text.last_approved_text: Mishon Impozzable

mission_text.text: Mishon Impozzable

text.last_approved_text: The boyz need loot. The boss needs loot. Grimgor needs loot. Every git needs loot! So they better find it; a good few raids should sort out the cash flow.

mission_text.text: The boyz need loot. The boss needs loot. Grimgor needs loot. Every git needs loot! So they better find it; a good few raids should sort out the cash flow.

text.last_approved_text: Find da Shiny Stuff

mission_text.text: Find da Shiny Stuff

text.last_approved_text: Apart from da Immortulz, Grimgor has never been one for company. But now is not the time to be a loner! If he wants to dominate the world, he needs to start mobbing-up!

mission_text.text: Apart from da Immortulz, Grimgor has never been one for company. But now is not the time to be a loner! If he wants to dominate the world, he needs to start mobbing-up!

text.last_approved_text: Mob-Up!

mission_text.text: Mob-Up!

text.last_approved_text: Magic is a tricky thing. A few of the enemy wizards are quite good at it! Fortunately, Mork and Gork can provide: some gobbos and Orcs can fling a good spell too. Find a Goblin Shaman as they're normally cheaper and easier to bully.

mission_text.text: Magic is a tricky thing. A few of the enemy wizards are quite good at it! Fortunately, Mork and Gork can provide: some gobbos and Orcs can fling a good spell too. Find a Goblin Shaman as they're normally cheaper and easier to bully.

text.last_approved_text: Get Me a Spell Flinga!

mission_text.text: Get Me a Spell Flinga!

text.last_approved_text: If their enemies don't fear the Greenskins, then how can they be dominated? Dish out some serious damage. Start sacking and looting in Grimgor's name!

mission_text.text: If their enemies don't fear the Greenskins, then how can they be dominated? Dish out some serious damage. Start sacking and looting in Grimgor's name!

text.last_approved_text: Sackin' for Pleasure

mission_text.text: Sackin' for Pleasure

text.last_approved_text: The Boss is eager to mercilessly crush his foes, but there's a few things that need doing in preparation for the big charge. Get these done, and keep Grimgor happy.

mission_text.text: The Boss is eager to mercilessly crush his foes, but there's a few things that need doing in preparation for the big charge. Get these done, and keep Grimgor happy.

text.last_approved_text: More Mishons

mission_text.text: More Mishons

text.last_approved_text: Orcs will travel leagues to join a burgeoning Waaagh!, but they won't come for just any Warboss. They are attracted to those favoured by the Gods, by those whose legends are created by the quests they undertake.

mission_text.text: Orcs will travel leagues to join a burgeoning Waaagh!, but they won't come for just any Warboss. They are attracted to those favoured by the Gods, by those whose legends are created by the quests they undertake.

text.last_approved_text: 'Ero Quest

mission_text.text: 'Ero Quest

text.last_approved_text: As much as Grimgor wants to kill everything on his own, even he knows he needs da boyz behind him in order to do that. The call has gone out, and the mobs are coming.

mission_text.text: As much as Grimgor wants to kill everything on his own, even he knows he needs da boyz behind him in order to do that. The call has gone out, and the mobs are coming.

text.last_approved_text: Mob Rule

text.last_approved_text: While spells of da Little Waaagh! are already at the Greenskins' disposal, it's time to get some of the 'bigga spellz' in play. Maybe a foot or fist of Gork to really wind the enemy up? Go and find an Orc Shaman.

mission_text.text: While spells of da Little Waaagh! are already at the Greenskins' disposal, it's time to get some of the 'bigga spellz' in play. Maybe a foot or fist of Gork to really wind the enemy up? Go and find an Orc Shaman.

text.last_approved_text: More ravaging is needed - Greenskin foes still have hope, some even think they can beat them! That needs taking from them - see to it!

text.last_approved_text: Sackin' Time!

mission_text.text: Sackin' Time!

text.last_approved_text: To bring about the largest Waaagh! this pitiful world has ever seen you need to target that Greenskin aggression. Achieve some key objectives and the Green Tide will flow!

mission_text.text: To bring about the largest Waaagh! this pitiful world has ever seen you need to target that Greenskin aggression. Achieve some key objectives and the Green Tide will flow!

text.last_approved_text: Yer Mishon… Should Ya Decide Ta Accept It!

mission_text.text: Yer Mishon… Should Ya Decide Ta Accept It!

text.last_approved_text: It ain't cheap keeping all these armies - Orcs are greedy gits that are always after loot and shiny stuff. It might be best to replenish "da cofferz" - a few raids should do the job.

mission_text.text: It ain't cheap keeping all these armies - Orcs are greedy gits that are always after loot and shiny stuff. It might be best to replenish "da cofferz" - a few raids should do the job.

text.last_approved_text: Raiderz ov da Last Orc

text.last_approved_text: The Waaagh! gathers pace! The enemies of the Greenskins - that's everyone without green skin (well, even a few Greenskins to be honest) - will witness a mob like never before. Da Great Ruckus begins!

mission_text.text: The Waaagh! gathers pace! The enemies of the Greenskins - that's everyone without green skin (well, even a few Greenskins to be honest) - will witness a mob like never before. Da Great Ruckus begins!

text.last_approved_text: Da Great Ruckus

mission_text.text: Da Great Ruckus

text.last_approved_text: The true horror of the Greenskin menace is not always seen on the battlefield but in the devastation left in the wake of the Orc ravagers. They are merciless, and often hungry as they scourge enemy ruins. Be merciless, be more Orc!

mission_text.text: The true horror of the Greenskin menace is not always seen on the battlefield but in the devastation left in the wake of the Orc ravagers. They are merciless, and often hungry as they scourge enemy ruins. Be merciless, be more Orc!

text.last_approved_text: Be More Orc!

mission_text.text: Be More Orc!

text.last_approved_text: Grimgor has no mates, he just tolerates a select few and even those run the risk of been cleaved in twain by Gitsnik should they anger him. Yet for the Waaagh! to be successful, Grimgor must give such brutes power, as even Ironhide cannot be in every place at once.

mission_text.text: Grimgor has no mates, he just tolerates a select few and even those run the risk of been cleaved in twain by Gitsnik should they anger him. Yet for the Waaagh! to be successful, Grimgor must give such brutes power, as even Ironhide cannot be in every place at once.

mission_text.text: Although Ironhide will never admit it, he belligerently knows that he needs the Bosses and Shamans around him to enact his will away from the mobs. Empower them so they may serve Gork (or Mork!).

text.last_approved_text: The best and shiniest stuff… the loot that can make the eyes of the hardiest Warboss water, is rarely in the neighbouring location. The boyz are going to have to loot deep into enemy territory to get the good stuff!

text.last_approved_text: Destroy! Unleash the beast that lies within every Greenskin. Da Green Gods want this world to tremble, and so this Savage Lord must be 'Da Scourge' and burn a scar across the lands that not even time will forget!

mission_text.text: Destroy! Unleash the beast that lies within every Greenskin. Da Green Gods want this world to tremble, and so this Savage Lord must be 'Da Scourge' and burn a scar across the lands that not even time will forget!
