mission_text.text: Da Scourge

text.last_approved_text: Grant the most able Warbosses and magic-users in the Greenskin ranks the power and status they need to bring about a slaughter. It is what Gork demands and Grimgor begrudgingly accepts as necessary!

mission_text.text: Grant the most able Warbosses and magic-users in the Greenskin ranks the power and status they need to bring about a slaughter. It is what Gork demands and Grimgor begrudgingly accepts as necessary!

text.last_approved_text: I Got Da Power!

mission_text.text: I Got Da Power!

text.last_approved_text: Grimgor's most feared allies need not only his backing so they can go about unimpeded, but if they are to spread the word of Ironhide's Waaagh! then they must be granted the power such a message demands!

mission_text.text: Grimgor's most feared allies need not only his backing so they can go about unimpeded, but if they are to spread the word of Ironhide's Waaagh! then they must be granted the power such a message demands!

text.last_approved_text: It Comez in Threes!

mission_text.text: It Comez in Threes!

text.last_approved_text: Even for Orcs, the lure of shiny stuff is as strong as the thrill of murder - the richest bosses are always the most successful. If Grimgor is to bring about Ragnarork then he must become the wealthiest Greenskin as well.

mission_text.text: Even for Orcs, the lure of shiny stuff is as strong as the thrill of murder - the richest bosses are always the most successful. If Grimgor is to bring about Ragnarork then he must become the wealthiest Greenskin as well.

text.last_approved_text: Ragnarork Costs

mission_text.text: Ragnarork Costs

text.last_approved_text: A Vampire strikes from the shadows as well as at the head of his skeletal legions. The von Carsteins have always been masters of plots and manipulation; ensure our Lord's goals are achieved by bringing such intrigues to their conclusion.

mission_text.text: A Vampire strikes from the shadows as well as at the head of his skeletal legions. The von Carsteins have always been masters of plots and manipulation; ensure our Lord's goals are achieved by bringing such intrigues to their conclusion.

text.last_approved_text: Intrigues of the Dead

mission_text.text: Intrigues of the Dead

text.last_approved_text: Raising a mortal with the Blood Kiss may sound an easy task, but we do not grant any living fool immortality. Such a gift should not be wasted on serfs - we must choose wisely.

mission_text.text: Raising a mortal with the Blood Kiss may sound an easy task, but we do not grant any living fool immortality. Such a gift should not be wasted on serfs - we must choose wisely.

text.last_approved_text: The Blood Kiss

mission_text.text: The Blood Kiss

text.last_approved_text: Our Lord's power comes from fear as much from the arcane. We need to ensure that his many enemies fear the von Carstein name and say it only in hushed whispers. Thus is our powerbase maintained and the cattle controlled.

mission_text.text: Our Lord's power comes from fear as much from the arcane. We need to ensure that his many enemies fear the von Carstein name and say it only in hushed whispers. Thus is our powerbase maintained and the cattle controlled.

text.last_approved_text: Fear the Night

mission_text.text: Fear the Night

text.last_approved_text: To tarry in Sylvania, and skulk in other dark places that welcome the dead, is short-sighted. If our master is to achieve his destiny then he must send his servants forth to start pulling - or removing - the levers of power.

mission_text.text: To tarry in Sylvania, and skulk in other dark places that welcome the dead, is short-sighted. If our master is to achieve his destiny then he must send his servants forth to start pulling - or removing - the levers of power.

text.last_approved_text: Vampires Abroad

mission_text.text: Vampires Abroad

text.last_approved_text: As the dead rise, the land itself revolts against the unnatural. We must spread this curse beyond our borders, let the mortals observe and see that death comes for all!

mission_text.text: As the dead rise, the land itself revolts against the unnatural. We must spread this curse beyond our borders, let the mortals observe and see that death comes for all!

text.last_approved_text: The Curse of Years

mission_text.text: The Curse of Years

text.last_approved_text: The von Carstein bloodline has always excelled at deceit and disguise. Vampires have many guises - a court noble, a renowned wizard, a loyal servant, a baron's spymaster… It is in these roles that the Vampires turn fate to their advantage.

mission_text.text: The von Carstein bloodline has always excelled at deceit and disguise. Vampires have many guises - a court noble, a renowned wizard, a loyal servant, a baron's spymaster… It is in these roles that the Vampires turn fate to their advantage.

text.last_approved_text: Day Walkers

mission_text.text: Day Walkers

text.last_approved_text: When the Great Necromancer, Nagash, first dabbled with Dark Magic it seeped into the world and broke it. Now many millennia later, Nagash's legacy continues - ravaging the world wherever Necromancy is practised.

mission_text.text: When the Great Necromancer, Nagash, first dabbled with Dark Magic it seeped into the world and broke it. Now many millennia later, Nagash's legacy continues - ravaging the world wherever Necromancy is practised.

text.last_approved_text: The Legacy of Nagash

mission_text.text: The Legacy of Nagash

text.last_approved_text: Mannfred was not the first von Carstein, nor will he be the last. In the last few decades there always seems to be another of Vlad's despicable sires crawling out of his crypt. Each as power hungry as the other. But it is Mannfred we serve and so we must ensure he maintains power.

mission_text.text: Mannfred was not the first von Carstein, nor will he be the last. In the last few decades there always seems to be another of Vlad's despicable sires crawling out of his crypt. Each as power hungry as the other. But it is Mannfred we serve and so we must ensure he maintains power.

text.last_approved_text: Always Another von Carstein

mission_text.text: Always Another von Carstein

text.last_approved_text: Mannfred lies at the centre of a great web of intrigue. A manipulator worthy of Tzeentch! From his lair, our master sends word to his puppets of tasks to be done, accounts to be settled and missions to achieve.

mission_text.text: Mannfred lies at the centre of a great web of intrigue. A manipulator worthy of Tzeentch! From his lair, our master sends word to his puppets of tasks to be done, accounts to be settled and missions to achieve.

text.last_approved_text: At the Centre of the Web

mission_text.text: At the Centre of the Web

text.last_approved_text: Our master has scoured the world for forbidden lore and artefacts of power. It's a search that continues and so word has reached us that another item of great power is within Count Mannfred's grasp.

mission_text.text: Our master has scoured the world for forbidden lore and artefacts of power. It's a search that continues and so word has reached us that another item of great power is within Count Mannfred's grasp.

text.last_approved_text: A Bloody Quest

mission_text.text: A Bloody Quest

text.last_approved_text: Of the von Carsteins, it was Vlad who was seen as the military genius - taking his Undead hosts to the walls of Altdorf itself. Mannfred, however, was thwarted at Hel Fenn. If this new incursion is to be considered a threat, then our master's forces need victory in battle.

mission_text.text: Of the von Carsteins, it was Vlad who was seen as the military genius - taking his Undead hosts to the walls of Altdorf itself. Mannfred, however, was thwarted at Hel Fenn. If this new incursion is to be considered a threat, then our master's forces need victory in battle.

text.last_approved_text: The Ghosts of Hel Fenn

mission_text.text: The Ghosts of Hel Fenn

text.last_approved_text: Rise the Undead legions - let them tirelessly march forth just like the armies of the Doomlord of olde!

mission_text.text: Rise the Undead legions - let them tirelessly march forth just like the armies of the Doomlord of olde!

text.last_approved_text: Revenge of the Doomlord

mission_text.text: Revenge of the Doomlord

text.last_approved_text: The von Carsteins dominate their homelands because of the terrifying climate they propagate. The few mortals that reside in or close to Sylvania live in constant fear, such is the power of the Midnight Aristocracy.

mission_text.text: The von Carsteins dominate their homelands because of the terrifying climate they propagate. The few mortals that reside in or close to Sylvania live in constant fear, such is the power of the Midnight Aristocracy.

text.last_approved_text: The Climate of Terror

mission_text.text: The Climate of Terror

text.last_approved_text: As the Undead rise and march forth, the influence of Dark Magic spreads across the lands - fell creatures take roost in once-homely caves, trees become rotten and twisted, and even houses buckle and decay as the corruption spreads.

mission_text.text: As the Undead rise and march forth, the influence of Dark Magic spreads across the lands - fell creatures take roost in once-homely caves, trees become rotten and twisted, and even houses buckle and decay as the corruption spreads.

text.last_approved_text: The Curse of Centuries

mission_text.text: The Curse of Centuries

text.last_approved_text: Back in the mists of time, when the Kings of Nehekhara rose up against Nagash, they were initially repelled by the Great Necromancer's awesome power. Our Lord must echo such victories and repulse all that challenge us!

mission_text.text: Back in the mists of time, when the Kings of Nehekhara rose up against Nagash, they were initially repelled by the Great Necromancer's awesome power. Our Lord must echo such victories and repulse all that challenge us!

text.last_approved_text: Fury of Nagash

mission_text.text: Fury of Nagash

text.last_approved_text: The Necromancers have raided the charnel pits and brought us fresh corpses. These should be joined with our legions to create a mighty Undead host worthy of the von Carstein name.

mission_text.text: The Necromancers have raided the charnel pits and brought us fresh corpses. These should be joined with our legions to create a mighty Undead host worthy of the von Carstein name.

text.last_approved_text: From the Charnel Pits

mission_text.text: From the Charnel Pits

text.last_approved_text: Mannfred must maintain political power of his domains. If he is to keep his quarrelling, power-hungry siblings in check then there cannot be any reason for them to question his motives and will. For should a rival Vampire sense weakness, it will strike.

mission_text.text: Mannfred must maintain political power of his domains. If he is to keep his quarrelling, power-hungry siblings in check then there cannot be any reason for them to question his motives and will. For should a rival Vampire sense weakness, it will strike.

text.last_approved_text: Political Domination

mission_text.text: Political Domination

text.last_approved_text: There is a danger by giving a creature as ambitious and predatory as a Vampire too much power. But Mannfred has been around his kin for centuries and knows how to deal with such turn-coats. However, he needs servants that are more than mere pawns, so must grant them a modicum of his power.

mission_text.text: There is a danger by giving a creature as ambitious and predatory as a Vampire too much power. But Mannfred has been around his kin for centuries and knows how to deal with such turn-coats. However, he needs servants that are more than mere pawns, so must grant them a modicum of his power.

text.last_approved_text: I Grant Thee A Great Boon…

mission_text.text: I Grant Thee A Great Boon…

text.last_approved_text: Mannfred sees his agents as little more than tools, yet some tools are more useful than others. For those lucky few minions, great rewards await - depending on how they serve our master of course.

mission_text.text: Mannfred sees his agents as little more than tools, yet some tools are more useful than others. For those lucky few minions, great rewards await - depending on how they serve our master of course.

text.last_approved_text: Invocation of Power

mission_text.text: Invocation of Power

text.last_approved_text: Mannfred's pall of darkness reaches across the nations, infusing the land with Dark Magic. Every place it touches, the dead no longer rest easily in their graves and crypts are broken open from the inside. And so the Undead take the world from the living...

mission_text.text: Mannfred's pall of darkness reaches across the nations, infusing the land with Dark Magic. Every place it touches, the dead no longer rest easily in their graves and crypts are broken open from the inside. And so the Undead take the world from the living...

text.last_approved_text: The Curse of Ages

mission_text.text: The Curse of Ages

text.last_approved_text: The Undead are inexhaustible - able to constantly replenish with each new killing. The mortals fear our legions, for they know deep down that, eventually, they will rise up and join them. It is time for our master to field such an army - a legion of Undeath that no foe can challenge!

mission_text.text: The Undead are inexhaustible - able to constantly replenish with each new killing. The mortals fear our legions, for they know deep down that, eventually, they will rise up and join them. It is time for our master to field such an army - a legion of Undeath that no foe can challenge!

text.last_approved_text: The Endless Legion

mission_text.text: The Endless Legion

text.last_approved_text: The machinations of the von Carsteins are complex and despotic. At the height of his power our master, Count Mannfred, must be ready to fend off any plot from a rival sibling ready to strike from the shadows. With immortal glory so close, maintaining his dominion is essential.

mission_text.text: The machinations of the von Carsteins are complex and despotic. At the height of his power our master, Count Mannfred, must be ready to fend off any plot from a rival sibling ready to strike from the shadows. With immortal glory so close, maintaining his dominion is essential.

text.last_approved_text: Blackest Will

mission_text.text: Blackest Will

text.last_approved_text: The Eternal Emperor stands ready to take his throne! His most loyal subjects will be rewarded with immortality and other gifts that no mortal could even comprehend; prepare those our master has deemed worthy to enter his scared circle.

mission_text.text: The Eternal Emperor stands ready to take his throne! His most loyal subjects will be rewarded with immortality and other gifts that no mortal could even comprehend; prepare those our master has deemed worthy to enter his scared circle.

text.last_approved_text: Circle of Blood

mission_text.text: Circle of Blood

text.last_approved_text: The mortals must fear Mannfred's touch - fear that his reach is long and that nowhere is safe from the dread Count. To extend such a reach he needs willing servants, with the power and status to influence every area of mortal society.

mission_text.text: The mortals must fear Mannfred's touch - fear that his reach is long and that nowhere is safe from the dread Count. To extend such a reach he needs willing servants, with the power and status to influence every area of mortal society.

text.last_approved_text: Those Who Serve

mission_text.text: Those Who Serve

text.last_approved_text: For Count Mannfred to sit upon a throne of bone as an Immortal Emperor, he must spread his influence far and ensure that his Unliving Empire is ready for its dread sovereign.

mission_text.text: For Count Mannfred to sit upon a throne of bone as an Immortal Emperor, he must spread his influence far and ensure that his Unliving Empire is ready for its dread sovereign.

text.last_approved_text: The Curse of Immortality

mission_text.text: The Curse of Immortality

text.last_approved_text: All are pawns of Chaos, all must serve. Do as the Dark Gods wish and begin the destruction. Thus is the way prepared for the End Times.

mission_text.text: All are pawns of Chaos, all must serve. Do as the Dark Gods wish and begin the destruction. Thus is the way prepared for the End Times.

text.last_approved_text: The Pawn

mission_text.text: The Pawn

text.last_approved_text: A loyal servant to the Chaos Gods is one that enacts carnage - that raids and destroys and scatters the mortals before him.

mission_text.text: A loyal servant to the Chaos Gods is one that enacts carnage - that raids and destroys and scatters the mortals before him.

text.last_approved_text: The Servant

mission_text.text: The Servant

text.last_approved_text: All hail the champions of Chaos, it is they who the eyes of the Gods fall upon. They are the ones that risk damnation in exchange for a chance of greatness - continue the slaughter!

mission_text.text: All hail the champions of Chaos, it is they who the eyes of the Gods fall upon. They are the ones that risk damnation in exchange for a chance of greatness - continue the slaughter!

text.last_approved_text: The Champion

mission_text.text: The Champion

text.last_approved_text: The destroyer comes, and with him the favour of the Ruinous Powers. The southern lands of milk and honey will wither at his touch.

mission_text.text: The destroyer comes, and with him the favour of the Ruinous Powers. The southern lands of milk and honey will wither at his touch.

text.last_approved_text: The Destroyer

mission_text.text: The Destroyer

text.last_approved_text: Behold the Everchosen! The Daemons rejoice for the End Times are here. Destroy and corrupt those that still hold out against the inevitable. Chaos has come - the world will be broken!

mission_text.text: Behold the Everchosen! The Daemons rejoice for the End Times are here. Destroy and corrupt those that still hold out against the inevitable. Chaos has come - the world will be broken!

text.last_approved_text: The Everchosen

mission_text.text: The Everchosen

text.last_approved_text: The Karaz Ankor has fallen into decline, assaulted by fell enemies above and below the ground… but no more! Everpeak has stirred, the High King demands that the Dwarf realm be brought back to its former glory. Let the task begin in earnest!

mission_text.text: The Karaz Ankor has fallen into decline, assaulted by fell enemies above and below the ground… but no more! Everpeak has stirred, the High King demands that the Dwarf realm be brought back to its former glory. Let the task begin in earnest!

text.last_approved_text: The Reckoning Begins

mission_text.text: The Reckoning Begins

text.last_approved_text: With the Time of Woes a distant memory, the Dwarfs should look to the future and the restoration of the Karaz Ankor. The more territory around and even beyond their traditional mountain homes the Dwarfs can claim, the more the Ancestors will be pleased.

mission_text.text: With the Time of Woes a distant memory, the Dwarfs should look to the future and the restoration of the Karaz Ankor. The more territory around and even beyond their traditional mountain homes the Dwarfs can claim, the more the Ancestors will be pleased.

text.last_approved_text: For the Ancestors

mission_text.text: For the Ancestors

text.last_approved_text: There must be more Dwarf expeditions deployed - let them take the regions in the High King's name, and wipe out many grudges regarding those who stand against the Dwarf race. In this way the Karaz Ankor will be returned to its rightful glory!

mission_text.text: There must be more Dwarf expeditions deployed - let them take the regions in the High King's name, and wipe out many grudges regarding those who stand against the Dwarf race. In this way the Karaz Ankor will be returned to its rightful glory!

text.last_approved_text: One Dwarfhold At a Time

mission_text.text: One Dwarfhold At a Time

text.last_approved_text: The Karaz Ankor will be great again, for Thorgrim has sworn it and the High King never reneges on an oath. Every Dwarf worth his beard bears the same bond. There are still regions outside of Dwarfen control, they must be brought under Karaz-a-Karak's dominion as soon as possible.

mission_text.text: The Karaz Ankor will be great again, for Thorgrim has sworn it and the High King never reneges on an oath. Every Dwarf worth his beard bears the same bond. There are still regions outside of Dwarfen control, they must be brought under Karaz-a-Karak's dominion as soon as possible.

text.last_approved_text: Grudgebearer's Oath

mission_text.text: Grudgebearer's Oath

text.last_approved_text: Not since Valaya and Grungni strode the mountains have the Dawi been in such a position. A few more realms taken will see the Karaz Ankor at its rightful stature - an empire ruled from Everpeak by a High King whose reign is as enduring as the mountains themselves. One last push, brave Dawi, one final push...

mission_text.text: Not since Valaya and Grungni strode the mountains have the Dawi been in such a position. A few more realms taken will see the Karaz Ankor at its rightful stature - an empire ruled from Everpeak by a High King whose reign is as enduring as the mountains themselves. One last push, brave Dawi, one final push...

text.last_approved_text: A Second Golden Age

mission_text.text: A Second Golden Age

text.last_approved_text: The election of a new Emperor has oft-led to turmoil as the machinations of the Elector Counts play out. But as the nobles conduct their petty power-struggles, the nation fractures. It is up to the newly-elected sovereign to begin the process of reunification - bringing an entire province under his rule must be a priority.

mission_text.text: The election of a new Emperor has oft-led to turmoil as the machinations of the Elector Counts play out. But as the nobles conduct their petty power-struggles, the nation fractures. It is up to the newly-elected sovereign to begin the process of reunification - bringing an entire province under his rule must be a priority.

text.last_approved_text: A Fractured Nation

mission_text.text: A Fractured Nation

text.last_approved_text: Even the worst Emperors in history, and - to our shame - there have been many, could claim to have more than one province under their rule. To truly bring the Empire back to greatness, the throne must exert its power to provinces further afield.

mission_text.text: Even the worst Emperors in history, and - to our shame - there have been many, could claim to have more than one province under their rule. To truly bring the Empire back to greatness, the throne must exert its power to provinces further afield.

text.last_approved_text: Unite the Lands

mission_text.text: Unite the Lands

text.last_approved_text: It was Magnus of Nuln that ended the turbulent Time of the Three Emperors, by defeating the Chaos Lord, Asavar Kul. In the wake of such a victory the Empire was united. To withstand another such invasion, we must be united again with more provinces under the Emperor's rule.

mission_text.text: It was Magnus of Nuln that ended the turbulent Time of the Three Emperors, by defeating the Chaos Lord, Asavar Kul. In the wake of such a victory the Empire was united. To withstand another such invasion, we must be united again with more provinces under the Emperor's rule.

text.last_approved_text: As Magnus Did So Shall We

mission_text.text: As Magnus Did So Shall We

text.last_approved_text: The time of feuding Elector Counts and petty squabbles between provinces is over. The encroaching threat from the north cannot be ignored any longer. To face the armies of Chaos the Empire must be as one. Only then does mankind stand a chance against the Dark Powers and their minions.

mission_text.text: The time of feuding Elector Counts and petty squabbles between provinces is over. The encroaching threat from the north cannot be ignored any longer. To face the armies of Chaos the Empire must be as one. Only then does mankind stand a chance against the Dark Powers and their minions.

text.last_approved_text: Under One Rule

mission_text.text: Under One Rule

text.last_approved_text: This time will be known as the Age of Franz; not since Magnus the Pious has there been an Emperor so beloved of his people and successful in bringing the provinces under Sigmar's banner. Such glory infuriates the Dark Gods, and they will strike hard to destroy the dynasty of the Reikland Princes. Unite the last of the realms, for Chaos comes!

mission_text.text: This time will be known as the Age of Franz; not since Magnus the Pious has there been an Emperor so beloved of his people and successful in bringing the provinces under Sigmar's banner. Such glory infuriates the Dark Gods, and they will strike hard to destroy the dynasty of the Reikland Princes. Unite the last of the realms, for Chaos comes!

text.last_approved_text: The Age of Franz

mission_text.text: The Age of Franz

text.last_approved_text: Grimgor's traditional stompin' ground was the northern peaks of the World's Edge Mountains, where he laid waste to Kislev and even marched through Sylvania, bedecking his banners with Vampire fangs. Since coming south to slap Gorfang Rotgut, Grimgor might as well hang around for a bit, and sort this sorry lot out. Gits.

mission_text.text: Grimgor's traditional stompin' ground was the northern peaks of the World's Edge Mountains, where he laid waste to Kislev and even marched through Sylvania, bedecking his banners with Vampire fangs. Since coming south to slap Gorfang Rotgut, Grimgor might as well hang around for a bit, and sort this sorry lot out. Gits.

text.last_approved_text: Down South

mission_text.text: Down South

text.last_approved_text: If the Greenskins are going to fear Grimgor - as they should - then he must take control and build up a great green empire from which he can launch an invasion to crush all enemies. The local tribes must fall into line or get a proper bootin'.

mission_text.text: If the Greenskins are going to fear Grimgor - as they should - then he must take control and build up a great green empire from which he can launch an invasion to crush all enemies. The local tribes must fall into line or get a proper bootin'.

text.last_approved_text: Get da Gits in Order

mission_text.text: Get da Gits in Order

text.last_approved_text: It's time to stop messing around and put the boot in! The Badlands, the World's Edge, the Empire - all of it is Grimgor's! Destroy the trespassers, take their lands and get the Waaagh! started.

mission_text.text: It's time to stop messing around and put the boot in! The Badlands, the World's Edge, the Empire - all of it is Grimgor's! Destroy the trespassers, take their lands and get the Waaagh! started.

text.last_approved_text: Put da Boot In

mission_text.text: Put da Boot In

text.last_approved_text: The momentum shifts as the Orc realms expand. The Dwarfs quail, the Empire shudders, even the forces of Chaos stutter as the Green Tide rises. Now is the time to bring outlying territories into Grimgor's clutches.

mission_text.text: The momentum shifts as the Orc realms expand. The Dwarfs quail, the Empire shudders, even the forces of Chaos stutter as the Green Tide rises. Now is the time to bring outlying territories into Grimgor's clutches.

text.last_approved_text: A Waaagh! is upon the Greenskins. The Orcs gather in great numbers - they must bring as many regions under Grimgor's iron fist as possible - such an act will appease Gork and Mork and ensure that Grimgor's name is remembered for all time.

text.last_approved_text: Since Count Mannfred's unfortunate defeat at Hel Fenn, Sylvania has been in decline. No longer is it feared as the dread land where the dead do not rest, but instead is seen as Stirland's bastard child. Now a von Carstein resides in Castle Drakenhof once again, it is time for the Vampires to take dominion over their haunted realm.

mission_text.text: Since Count Mannfred's unfortunate defeat at Hel Fenn, Sylvania has been in decline. No longer is it feared as the dread land where the dead do not rest, but instead is seen as Stirland's bastard child. Now a von Carstein resides in Castle Drakenhof once again, it is time for the Vampires to take dominion over their haunted realm.

text.last_approved_text: Sylvania Resurrected

mission_text.text: Sylvania Resurrected

text.last_approved_text: Mannfred's influence must spread across all of Sylvania and beyond into the Empire itself if he is to realise his dread ambition of becoming the first and only Eternal Emperor. But before he can rule, a powerbase should be established and fresh troops risen for the challenges ahead.

mission_text.text: Mannfred's influence must spread across all of Sylvania and beyond into the Empire itself if he is to realise his dread ambition of becoming the first and only Eternal Emperor. But before he can rule, a powerbase should be established and fresh troops risen for the challenges ahead.

text.last_approved_text: The Spread of Undeath

mission_text.text: The Spread of Undeath

text.last_approved_text: Now is the time for Fell Bats to blot out the sun, for gloom to fall upon the lands of the living and the Long Night to begin. Mannfred's dominion shall extend far and wide if the prophecies in the Liber Noctus are to come true.

mission_text.text: Now is the time for Fell Bats to blot out the sun, for gloom to fall upon the lands of the living and the Long Night to begin. Mannfred's dominion shall extend far and wide if the prophecies in the Liber Noctus are to come true.

text.last_approved_text: The Long Night

mission_text.text: The Long Night

text.last_approved_text: Mannfred's fell influence saturates the lands, but for the scions of Sigmar's Blood to truly fear the power of the Vampires then all the Old World must be taken in von Carstein's name. Nothing is beyond the reach of the Midnight Aristocracy!

mission_text.text: Mannfred's fell influence saturates the lands, but for the scions of Sigmar's Blood to truly fear the power of the Vampires then all the Old World must be taken in von Carstein's name. Nothing is beyond the reach of the Midnight Aristocracy!

text.last_approved_text: Behold the Midnight Aristocracy

mission_text.text: Behold the Midnight Aristocracy

text.last_approved_text: The time is now - Mannfred von Carstein needs to make his move and take Sigmar's throne, or claim the lands from any foe - living or immortal - that dares resist the inevitable. Mannfred will rule over all as an Eternal Emperor - an immortal king that even the Chaos Gods bow to!

mission_text.text: The time is now - Mannfred von Carstein needs to make his move and take Sigmar's throne, or claim the lands from any foe - living or immortal - that dares resist the inevitable. Mannfred will rule over all as an Eternal Emperor - an immortal king that even the Chaos Gods bow to!

text.last_approved_text: An Eternal Emperor

mission_text.text: An Eternal Emperor

text.last_approved_text: A Vampire strikes from the shadows as well as at the head of skeletal legions. The von Carsteins have always been masters of plots and manipulation; ensure our Lord's goals are achieved by bringing such intrigues to their conclusion.

mission_text.text: A Vampire strikes from the shadows as well as at the head of skeletal legions. The von Carsteins have always been masters of plots and manipulation; ensure our Lord's goals are achieved by bringing such intrigues to their conclusion.

text.last_approved_text: Intrigues of the Dead

mission_text.text: Intrigues of the Dead

text.last_approved_text: Raising a mortal with the Blood Kiss may sound an easy task, but we do not grant any living fool immortality. Such a gift should not be wasted on serfs - we must choose wisely.

mission_text.text: Raising a mortal with the Blood Kiss may sound an easy task, but we do not grant any living fool immortality. Such a gift should not be wasted on serfs - we must choose wisely.

text.last_approved_text: The Blood Kiss

mission_text.text: The Blood Kiss

text.last_approved_text: Our Lord's power comes from fear as much from the arcane. We need to ensure that his many enemies fear the von Carstein name and say it only in hushed whispers. Thus is our powerbase maintained and the cattle controlled.

mission_text.text: Our Lord's power comes from fear as much from the arcane. We need to ensure that his many enemies fear the von Carstein name and say it only in hushed whispers. Thus is our powerbase maintained and the cattle controlled.

text.last_approved_text: Fear the Night

mission_text.text: Fear the Night

text.last_approved_text: To tarry in Sylvania, and skulk in other dark places that welcome the dead, is short-sighted. If our master is to achieve his destiny then his servants must be sent forth to start pulling - or removing - the levers of power.

mission_text.text: To tarry in Sylvania, and skulk in other dark places that welcome the dead, is short-sighted. If our master is to achieve his destiny then his servants must be sent forth to start pulling - or removing - the levers of power.

text.last_approved_text: Vampires Abroad

mission_text.text: Vampires Abroad

text.last_approved_text: As the dead rise, the land itself revolts against the unnatural. We must spread this curse beyond our borders, let the mortals observe and see that death comes for all!

mission_text.text: As the dead rise, the land itself revolts against the unnatural. We must spread this curse beyond our borders, let the mortals observe and see that death comes for all!

text.last_approved_text: The Curse of Years

mission_text.text: The Curse of Years

text.last_approved_text: The von Carstein bloodline has always excelled at deceit and disguise. Vampires have many guises - a court noble, a renowned wizard, a loyal servant, a baron's spymaster… It is in these roles that they turn fate to their advantage.

mission_text.text: The von Carstein bloodline has always excelled at deceit and disguise. Vampires have many guises - a court noble, a renowned wizard, a loyal servant, a baron's spymaster… It is in these roles that they turn fate to their advantage.

text.last_approved_text: Day Walkers

mission_text.text: Day Walkers

text.last_approved_text: When the Great Necromancer, Nagash, first dabbled with Dark Magic it seeped into the world and broke it. Now many millennia later, his legacy continues - ravaging the world wherever Necromancy is practised.

mission_text.text: When the Great Necromancer, Nagash, first dabbled with Dark Magic it seeped into the world and broke it. Now many millennia later, his legacy continues - ravaging the world wherever Necromancy is practised.

text.last_approved_text: The Legacy of Nagash

mission_text.text: The Legacy of Nagash

text.last_approved_text: Vlad may have been the first von Carstein, but he will not be the last. In the last few decades there always seems to be another despicable sire crawling from its crypt, each as power hungry as the other. But it Vlad is the one we serve; we must ensure he remains in power.

mission_text.text: Vlad may have been the first von Carstein, but he will not be the last. In the last few decades there always seems to be another despicable sire crawling from its crypt, each as power hungry as the other. But it Vlad is the one we serve; we must ensure he remains in power.

text.last_approved_text: Always Another von Carstein

mission_text.text: Always Another von Carstein

text.last_approved_text: Vlad lies at the centre of a great web of intrigue. From his lair, our master sends word to his puppets of tasks to be done, accounts to be settled and missions to complete.

mission_text.text: Vlad lies at the centre of a great web of intrigue. From his lair, our master sends word to his puppets of tasks to be done, accounts to be settled and missions to complete.

text.last_approved_text: At the Centre of the Web

mission_text.text: At the Centre of the Web

text.last_approved_text: Our master has scoured the world for forbidden lore and artefacts of power. It's a search that continues and so word has reached us that another item of great power is within Vlad's grasp.

mission_text.text: Our master has scoured the world for forbidden lore and artefacts of power. It's a search that continues and so word has reached us that another item of great power is within Vlad's grasp.

text.last_approved_text: A Bloody Quest

mission_text.text: A Bloody Quest

text.last_approved_text: Of the von Carsteins, it was Vlad who was seen as the military genius - taking his Undead hosts to the walls of Altdorf itself. Yet that was then; if this new incursion is to be considered a threat, then our forces need victory in battle.

mission_text.text: Of the von Carsteins, it was Vlad who was seen as the military genius - taking his Undead hosts to the walls of Altdorf itself. Yet that was then; if this new incursion is to be considered a threat, then our forces need victory in battle.

text.last_approved_text: The Ghosts of Hel Fenn

mission_text.text: The Ghosts of Hel Fenn

text.last_approved_text: Rise the Undead legions - let them tirelessly march forth just like the armies of the Doomlord of olde!

mission_text.text: Rise the Undead legions - let them tirelessly march forth just like the armies of the Doomlord of olde!

text.last_approved_text: Revenge of the Doomlord

mission_text.text: Revenge of the Doomlord

text.last_approved_text: The von Carsteins dominate their homelands because of the terrifying climate they propagate. The few mortals that reside in or close to Sylvania live in constant fear, such is the power of the Midnight Aristocracy…

mission_text.text: The von Carsteins dominate their homelands because of the terrifying climate they propagate. The few mortals that reside in or close to Sylvania live in constant fear, such is the power of the Midnight Aristocracy…

text.last_approved_text: The Climate of Terror

mission_text.text: The Climate of Terror

text.last_approved_text: As the Undead rise and march forth, the influence of Dark Magic spreads across the lands - fell creatures take roost in once-homely caves, trees become rotten and twisted, and even houses buckle and decay as the corruption spreads.

mission_text.text: As the Undead rise and march forth, the influence of Dark Magic spreads across the lands - fell creatures take roost in once-homely caves, trees become rotten and twisted, and even houses buckle and decay as the corruption spreads.

text.last_approved_text: The Curse of Centuries

mission_text.text: The Curse of Centuries

text.last_approved_text: Back in the mists of time, when the kings of Nehekhara rose up against Nagash, they were initially repelled by the Great Necromancer's awesome power. Our Lord must echo such victories and repulse all that challenge us!

mission_text.text: Back in the mists of time, when the kings of Nehekhara rose up against Nagash, they were initially repelled by the Great Necromancer's awesome power. Our Lord must echo such victories and repulse all that challenge us!

text.last_approved_text: Fury of Nagash

mission_text.text: Fury of Nagash

text.last_approved_text: The Necromancers have raided the charnel pits and brought us fresh corpses. These should be joined with our legions to create a mighty Undead host worthy of the von Carstein name.

mission_text.text: The Necromancers have raided the charnel pits and brought us fresh corpses. These should be joined with our legions to create a mighty Undead host worthy of the von Carstein name.

text.last_approved_text: From the Charnel Pits

mission_text.text: From the Charnel Pits

text.last_approved_text: Vlad must maintain political power over his domains. If he is to keep his quarrelling, power-hungry relatives in check then there cannot be any reason for them to question his motives and will. For should a rival Vampire sense weakness, it will strike.

mission_text.text: Vlad must maintain political power over his domains. If he is to keep his quarrelling, power-hungry relatives in check then there cannot be any reason for them to question his motives and will. For should a rival Vampire sense weakness, it will strike.

text.last_approved_text: Political Domination

mission_text.text: Political Domination

text.last_approved_text: There is a danger by giving a creature as ambitious and predatory as a Vampire too much power. But Vlad knows his kin, knows how they think, knows how to deal with such turn-coats. However, he needs servants that are more than mere pawns, so must grant them a modicum of his power.

mission_text.text: There is a danger by giving a creature as ambitious and predatory as a Vampire too much power. But Vlad knows his kin, knows how they think, knows how to deal with such turn-coats. However, he needs servants that are more than mere pawns, so must grant them a modicum of his power.

text.last_approved_text: I Grant Thee A Great Boon…

mission_text.text: I Grant Thee A Great Boon…

text.last_approved_text: Vlad sees his agents as little more than tools, yet some tools are more useful than others. For those lucky few minions, great rewards await - depending on how they serve our master of course.

mission_text.text: Vlad sees his agents as little more than tools, yet some tools are more useful than others. For those lucky few minions, great rewards await - depending on how they serve our master of course.

text.last_approved_text: Invocation of Power

mission_text.text: Invocation of Power

text.last_approved_text: The von Carstein pall of darkness reaches across the nations, infusing the land with Dark Magic. Every place it touches, the dead no longer rest easily in their graves and crypts are broken open from the inside. And so the Undead take the world from the living...

mission_text.text: The von Carstein pall of darkness reaches across the nations, infusing the land with Dark Magic. Every place it touches, the dead no longer rest easily in their graves and crypts are broken open from the inside. And so the Undead take the world from the living...

text.last_approved_text: The Curse of Ages

mission_text.text: The Curse of Ages

text.last_approved_text: The Undead are inexhaustible - able to constantly replenish with each new killing. The mortals fear our legions, for they know deep down that, eventually, they will rise up and join them. It is time for our master to field such an army - a legion of Undeath that no foe can challenge!

mission_text.text: The Undead are inexhaustible - able to constantly replenish with each new killing. The mortals fear our legions, for they know deep down that, eventually, they will rise up and join them. It is time for our master to field such an army - a legion of Undeath that no foe can challenge!

text.last_approved_text: The Endless Legion

mission_text.text: The Endless Legion

text.last_approved_text: The machinations of the von Carsteins are complex and despotic. At the height of his power our master must be ready to fend off any plot from a rival ready to strike from the shadows. With immortal glory so close, maintaining his dominion is essential.

mission_text.text: The machinations of the von Carsteins are complex and despotic. At the height of his power our master must be ready to fend off any plot from a rival ready to strike from the shadows. With immortal glory so close, maintaining his dominion is essential.

text.last_approved_text: Blackest Will

mission_text.text: Blackest Will

text.last_approved_text: The Eternal Emperor stands ready to take his throne! His most loyal subjects will be rewarded with immortality and other gifts that no mortal could even comprehend; prepare those our master has deemed worthy to enter his scared circle.

mission_text.text: The Eternal Emperor stands ready to take his throne! His most loyal subjects will be rewarded with immortality and other gifts that no mortal could even comprehend; prepare those our master has deemed worthy to enter his scared circle.

text.last_approved_text: Circle of Blood

mission_text.text: Circle of Blood

text.last_approved_text: The mortals must fear Vlad's Unliving touch - fear that his reach is long and that nowhere is safe from his gnarled talons. To extend such a reach he needs willing servants, with the power and status to influence every area of mortal society.

mission_text.text: The mortals must fear Vlad's Unliving touch - fear that his reach is long and that nowhere is safe from his gnarled talons. To extend such a reach he needs willing servants, with the power and status to influence every area of mortal society.

text.last_approved_text: Those Who Serve

mission_text.text: Those Who Serve

text.last_approved_text: For a von Carstein to sit upon a throne of bone as an Immortal Emperor, he must spread his influence far and ensure that his Unliving Empire is ready for its dread sovereign.

mission_text.text: For a von Carstein to sit upon a throne of bone as an Immortal Emperor, he must spread his influence far and ensure that his Unliving Empire is ready for its dread sovereign.

text.last_approved_text: The Curse of Immortality

mission_text.text: The Curse of Immortality
